name: Spiral Source
conclusion: The origin is a spiral source for the system of differential equations given by $\dot{x} = y$ and $\dot{y} = -x - y$

missing.statement: Show that the eigenvalues of the matrix associated with the system of differential equations have non-zero real and imaginary parts. This will imply that the origin is a spiral.
Determine the direction of the spiral (inwards or outwards) by analyzing the sign of the real part of the eigenvalues or by examining the vector field near the origin.
